programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.desc: A romantic drama that highlights love stories which end with failure due to various social circumstances. The five parts are called "The Impossible Love", "September Rain", "After You, My Love", "Thank You for Forgetting", "Beautiful Like the Moon", and "O Neighbor of the Valley".

programme.title: Babour Ellouh
programme.desc: The events revolve around the bitter reality of young Algerians, who resort to fleeing and traveling illegally in search of a better future, which reveals many tragic stories.

What On Earth?
programme.desc: Embark on an eye-opening journey as experts investigate the startling mysteries captured by satellites orbiting the Earth: from hidden worlds to unexplainable natural phenomena. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: The Best Of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Sea Serpents: Sightings of serpentine creatures lurking in dark waters have been documented for centuries - the MonsterQuest team investigate two legends as they look for truth. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: New. UFO Storm: In 2008, the UK's Ministry of Defence released decades' worth of classified UFO files to the public. One month later, UFO hysteria ripped through the country. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: UFO Hunters UFO Storm - Season 2, Episode 9
Counting Cars
programme.desc: Don't Tell Danny: Danny's obsession with classic cars does not extend to the humble Smart car - so when Mike customises his own, the job needs to be kept top secret! (S4, ep 25)

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: The Return Of The Big Twin: Mike and Roli are wowed by a customised Chevy Impala and Danny battles to strike a deal on a Satellite Sebring. Ryan works on a secret project. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Counting Cars The Return of the Big Twin
Counting Cars
programme.desc: I Want My Caddy Back: Kevin's brother puts Danny in a tough position when he calls with a tempting offer. Later, The Count gets sidetracked while shopping for a Rolls-Royce. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: Counting Cars I Want My Caddy Back

programme.desc: Execution Day: Adam and Caveman Rob head to Indonesia, where they receive their two worst bites to date: from a Giant Asian Centipede and a 16-foot Reticulated Python. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Kings of Pain Execution Day - Season 1, Episode 6

programme.desc: Pawn With The Wind: The guys are thrilled when a $1 bill signed by Clark Gable arrives. An item from Ulysses S. Grant's funeral also finds its way into Rick's hands. (S8, ep 21)

programme.title: Pawn Stars Pawn with the Wind
Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn of Fire: A model train, allegedly owned by 'The Man in Black' Johnny Cash rolls into the shop. Is the train worth adding to Rick's rock'n'roll collection? (S17, ep 1)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: She Bidded Me with Science!: Lisa inadvertently causes complications in California, while Ivy and his son conjure up a locker with some mysterious sports equipment. (S13, ep 17)

programme.title: Storage Wars She Bidded Me with Science!

programme.desc: Million Dollar Deal Part 1: A ventriloquist leaves Karen and Bobby J speechless, and an angry mixed martial arts fighter takes a swing at Byron. (S12, ep 12)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn Million Dollar Deal - Part One

programme.desc: Alien Apocalypse: If extraterrestrials visited Earth would they enlighten us or destroy us? Experts examine the possibility of a doomsday orchestrated by an alien enemy. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Alien Fallout: After seeing an odd flying object in 1980, a woman was hospitalised as she lost clumps of hair and skin. The team reopens her potential 'alien effects' case. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: UFO Hunters Alien Fallout - Season 2, Episode 8

programme.desc: The Storming of Area 51: When millions responded to a call to storm Area 51, the US military vowed deadly force. Are they hiding the truth about extraterrestrials on Earth? (S12, ep 20)

programme.desc: Secrets of the Exoplanets: Over the past 20 years, thousands of potentially habitable exoplanets have been found. Could they be home to intelligent extraterrestrial life? (S12, ep 22)

programme.desc: FBI vs MLK: The story of Martin Luther King vs J Edgar Hoover, who took exception to King's criticism of the FBI and went on to investigate him. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A new service provides a hologram to your loved ones who passed away and left our world. This service allows a man (Tim Robbins) to be face to face with a younger version of his late stepfather (Jon Hamm).

programme.title: The Roads Not Taken
programme.desc: Following a day in the life of Leo and his daughter Molly, who finds herself forced to look after her hallucinogenic father, as she faces her own uncertain future.

programme.title: I Will Find You a Better Home
programme.desc: A real estate company's core talent, Miss Fang, gets moved by the boss to a Shanghai shop, where she shares management duties with Mr. Xu. Meanwhile, the shop employees must carefully get along with the two managers because of their completely different management philosophies.

programme.title: The Trip to Greece
programme.desc: In the fourth film in The Trip series, actors Rob Brydon and Steve Coogan resume their tradition of trying local cuisine and visiting ancient landmarks as they take a trip from Troy to Ithaca.

programme.title: Superintelligence
programme.desc: The average woman Carol Peters finds herself facing a serious challenge when a powerful super-intelligence chooses to study her. It becomes up to her to prove to the A.I. that mankind is worth saving or else humanity will be destroyed.

programme.title: Love Is All You Need
programme.desc: As their children prepare to marry each other, Ida and Philip realize that they may have a second chance at love, after the former walks away from her cheating husband, and the latter tries to figure out a way to move on from the death of his beloved wife.

programme.title: El Karazoun
programme.desc: A Syrian businessman, Adnan, travels to Beirut and gets exposed to an accident at the port explosion, so he decides to disappear in order to teach his spoiled daughter, Nour, how to be self-reliant and discover the truth around her. However, Karim and Rabee try to seize Nour's wealth.

programme.title: Thuluj alsayf
programme.desc: Among people’s every day stories, Ahmed and Nabila share love but their careers matter a lot in supporting their families. In Laila’s story, she is an undergraduate whose family depends on her father’s small income, and she seldom sees her married siblings. A third story is about Bothayna and Salah who are happily married with a son, but are parted when Salah gets shot while chasing smugglers.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.desc: A collection of sketches discussing social and global issues like marriage, power, work, and future in a satirical way.

programme.title: Khareef Omar
programme.desc: Follows a retired lawyer whose daughter is subjected to violence by her husband while they are residing in another country. As he tries hard to protect her through legal means, he faces many obstacles and is forced to use other methods.

programme.title: Arbeeny Fy el Eshreen
programme.desc: Fahd wakes up after a coma that lasted nearly twenty years and finds himself at the age of forty. He tries to remember and learn everything he has missed. He finds himself at a crossroads, either to continue alone or to defend his previous life and recover it, whatever the consequences are.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: End Share 9
programme.desc: After he became wealthy following an unexpected event that took place years ago, Fares finds himself targeted by Adnan and a person close to him.

programme.title: Nassibi w Esmetek 4
programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau, gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jamborî.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Jams, Mandy a Norman gyda'i gilydd ar Arwr y Mynydd gyda Moose. Today, Jams, Mandy and Norman are together on the Mountain Hero with Moose.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Pero, cath yr Harbwr Feistr, ar goll ac mae pawb yn ceisio eu gorau glas i ddod o hyd iddo. Pero, the Harbourmaster's cat is missing. Everyone's on the lookout for him but where is he?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and friends. Today's theme is Trees.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Pan mae'n cyfarfod â Glas mae Coch wedi ei syfrdanu mai nad hi yw'r unig liw yng Ngwlad y Lliwiau. Red is surprised to discover she's not the only colour in the world when she meets Blue.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn penderfynu creu ei bersawr chwaethus ei hun. When the weasels ruin Toad's perfume and then occupy his home, is the new stinky cologne the answer to regaining Toad Hall?

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, efo disgyblion Ysgol Gymraeg Bro Teyr. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish into something special.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: New: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno gyda theulu sy'n cneifio ar eu fferm, Erin yn chwarae rygbi, a Meleri yn mynd am dro gyda Mai ym Mharc Cwm Darran. Today: sheep shearing and rugby.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae'r Cywion Bach ar antur geiriau i ddysgu gair newydd sbon, 'tractor', drwy wneud jig-so, chwarae ac hyd yn oed gweld ffrind yn gyrru tractor bach. We learn about the word tractor!

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Shwshaswyn heddiw? What's happening in the Shwshaswyn world today?

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Dona Direidi wrth iddi gynnal parti pen-blwydd llawn hwyl. Heddiw, bydd Tesni yn cael parti pitsa gyda Tref y ci. Today, Tesni will be having a pizza party with Tref the dog.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn yn penderfynu newid ei ffyrdd ac ymddwyn yn gyfrifol a phwysig drwy fod yn Swyddog Diogelwch y goedwig. Cochyn decides to change his ways and become Safety Officer for the wood.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Jen yn edrych ymlaen at chwarae gêm o bêl-droed gyda Jim. Jen is looking forward to playing a game of football with Jim but they need to create two goals exactly the same size.

programme.title: Sblij a Sbloj
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r ddau ddireidus yn glanhau'r ty, gan lwyddo i golli'r lythyren 'e' oddi ar yr arwydd! Sblij and Sbloj are busy cleaning the house - and somehow manage to lose the letter 'e'!

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u byd bach o hud
programme.desc: Mae'r plant yn ymweld â fferm i ddarganfod o le mae llaeth yn dod. The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a Big Farm, to find cows.

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u Byd Bach Hud

programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Penygroes yn ymweld ag ASRA yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol Penygroes visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches to make you laugh!

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Cyfres hwyliog am griw o ffrindiau bach ciwt. A fun series about a crew of cute friends.

programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth, a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jamborî!

programme.title: Sbarc

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Laura, Matthew, Bethan a Gwilym sy'n ein tywys i fyny Mynydd y Gwrhyd, Cwm Tawe; Mynydd Parys, Amlwch; Nebo; a Phenrhyncoch. We visit Cwmtawe, Amwlch, Nebo and the Aberystwyth area.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn dod at ei gilydd. Faint ohonyn nhw ydych chi'n eu cofio? All the Colourblocks come together. How many do you remember?

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan fydd Crawc yn penderfynu gwersylla ar lan yr afon, mae'r gwencïod yn achub ar y cyfle i gymryd drosodd y Crawcdy. The weasels grab an opportunity to take over Toad Hall. Poor Toad!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fo'r haul yn diflannu, mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n gwibio i'r gofod i weld beth sy'n digwydd. When the sun mysteriously disappears Blero and his friends zoom up to space to solve things.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw a chriw o ffrindiau yn adeiladu rafft, ac fe gawn ni gwrdd a Hetti a'i cheffyl, Bunny. Today, Meleri will be meeting Megan and a lot of pigeons!

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: New: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Prys a'r Pryfed heddiw? What's happening in Prys a'r Pryfed's world today?

programme.title: New: Boom!
programme.desc: Tro ma, bydd y brodyr Bidder yn datgelu faint o bi pi sydd mewn pwll nofio arferol, ac arbrawf ffrwydrol efo balwns a laser. The brothers reveal how much wee is in a typical swimming pool!

programme.title: Bois y Pizza: Chwe' Gwlad
programme.desc: Mae Bois y Pizza yn ôl ac ar daith fwyd i wledydd pencampwriaeth rygbi'r chwe gwlad! The Pizza Boys are back with a food trip to the countries of the Six Nations Rugby Championship!

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Weekend game highlights, including Briton Ferry Llansawel v The New Saints, Bala Town v Flint Mountain and Buckley Town v Connah's Quay.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Sut mae cadw'n oer pan mae'r tywydd yn boeth? Dyna beth mae Peredur, Peri a Casi'n ceisio ei ddatrys. Peredur, Peri & Casi try to work out how to stay cool when the weather is boiling hot.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'r cymylau bychain yn chwarae cuddio ac mae Haul yn ysu cael ymuno yn y gêm. The little clouds are playing hide and seek and Sun wants to join in.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Dyw Pablo ddim yn hoffi pobl yn ei wylio tra mae'n arlunio. Pablo doesn't like people watching him draw. This leads to a bout of stage fright before the art world's big talent show.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Bolgi a Cyw'n poeni am un o ieir y fferm. Mae hi wedi dodwy wyau lliw indigo! Bolgi and Cyw are worried about one of the chickens on the farm. She has laid indigo coloured eggs!

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Ysgol Pwll Coch sy'n help yng Ngwesty Sigldigwt heddiw a byddwn yn cwrdd ag Annie a Megan sy'n berchen ceffylau. We meet Annie and Megan who both own horses.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: New: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn a Help Llaw yn adeiladu parc themau anhygoel! On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn and Help Llaw have built an amazing theme park!

programme.title: New: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Nel yn holi 'Sut mae ceir yn gweithio'? ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am foch pitw bach a sut mae eu gwaith nhw yw gwneud i geir weithio. How do cars work? is the question asked by Nel.

programme.title: Nos Da Cyw
programme.desc: Sh! Mae'r haul yn mynd i'w wely ac mae'n amser i ni gael stori fach cyn cysgu. Shh! The sun is going to bed so let's have a lovely little bedtime story.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae Hari Hipo wrth ei fodd yn chwarae yn y mwd - ond ddim heddiw. Tybed pam a thybed a all gair newydd heddiw, 'pont' ei helpu? Wil today's word, 'bridge', help Hari Hippos?

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Mae Rhys yn chwarae i dim hoci ia enwog Diawled Caerdydd - a fydd e'n ennill ei dlws unigol cyntaf? Rhys plays ice hockey for Cardiff Junior Devils. But will he win his first solo trophy?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Benja wedi cael ei gipio i'r awyr gan farcud sy'n hedfan yn wyllt! Fydd Guto a Lili yn achub eu ffrind? Benja's up in the air as an unwilling passenger of a flyaway kite!

programme.title: Llan-ar-goll-en
programme.desc: Mae Prys yn dod o hyd i lythyr gan Ceri yn datgan ei bod wedi mynd, ond i ble a pham? Prys finds a letter from Ceri telling him she's gone away, but to where and why?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Dyw Odo a'r adar bach eraill heb gael eu dewis ar gyfer y tim peldroed. Penderfyna Odo greu tim peldroed ei hunan! Odo puts together a football team for little birds.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Gydag ychydig o help gan Taid, mae Stiw ac Elsi'n smalio mai gofodwyr ydyn nhw, ar daith i blaned Mawrth. Stiw and Elsi, with Taid's help, pretend they are astronauts on their way to Mars.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid y byd ac yn y rhaglen hon cawn ddod i nabod y Rhino a'r Alpaca. In this programme we get to know the Rhino and the Alpaca.

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Francois ar goll ar y môr ar ôl iddo fenthyca cwch Capten Cimwch i fynd i wylio'r morfilod. Francois is lost at sea after he takes Cap'n Cimwch's boat to go whale-watching

programme.title: Amser Maith Yn Ôl
programme.desc: Mae pawb ar Fferm Llwyn yr Eos yn brysur iawn, mae Dad wedi mynd i'r Mart, a mam yn paratoi swper. It's a busy day at Llwyn yr Eos Farm, and Dad has gone to the Mart!

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae pawb yn teimlo'n llwglyd heddiw a neb yn fwy na Lleuad. Everyone is hungry, especially Moon.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo wedi dod o hyd i sbectol goll nain, ond ydi'r sbectol wedi torri? Pablo finds Nain's lost spectacles, but they make the world look fuzzy. Are they broken?
